Name: Battle Imagine - Lizardman King
Description:
Activates or advances Lizardman King's Battle Imagine skill: Ultimate! Silent Tide.

Ultimate! Silent Tide
Summon Boss: Lizardman King to deal Water Attack Damage to nearby enemies and Silence them for 10s.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
